name: Valentines Crush Match Three
description:
Valentines Crush the new fun to play match 3 puzzle game.
- 12 Exciting Levels
- Cute Graphics to Celebrate You Valentine.
- Swap Valentines Items to make a match, can match 4 or more for special items.
- Score enough points and clear the ice cubes to unlock the levels
- Free to play
- Fun to play
- Share with your Valentine on Facebook
